items.content_html: A Micro SaaS (Software as a Service) project is a lightweight, niche-focused software solution designed to address a specific problem for a well-defined target audience. This project will be a web-based platform that operates on a subscription or freemium model, delivering value through automation, analytics, or specialized tools.

This project will be a web-based platform that operates on a subscription or freemium model, delivering value through automation, analytics, or specialized tools.

items.content_html: A lightweight, feature-rich AJAX client library that provides jQuery-like functionality with broad browser compatibility and modern features. This library offers a robust solution for handling HTTP requests in JavaScript applications.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
